Reviews.Title: “Keep away until Libyan war guests leave”

Reviews.Content: brother weekend whilst hotel spotless staff nicest crew encountered recently smiles common ie restaurant lobby unusable due war wounded treated istanbul effort congratulate applaud turkish government initiative surely management warn prospective visitors hotel centre health centre ambiance conducive pleasure weekend istanbul
